org.contentmine.graphics.svg.cache

Class TextLineFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.cache.TextLineFormatter

  • public class TextLineFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    formats textlines especially wrapping, de-hyphenation. defaults: dehyphenate = true; joinLines = true; indentedParagraphs = true; indentedContinuation = false; addSpaceInLineJoins = true; ndecimal = 2; minimumFontScaledLeftIndent = 1.3;
    Author:
    pm286
